Control Name: 5.2.1 Ensure that Activity Log Alert exists for Create Policy Assignment (Scored)
Control Statement: Monitoring for create policy assignment events gives insight into changes done in azure policy - assignments and may reduce the time it takes to detect unsolicited changes.
